content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Thank you, Max. I appreciate your interest in the apartment. What rental price are you willing to offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I would like to offer 650 Euro per month for the apartment. Is this price acceptable for you?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your offer, Max. However, I was expecting a higher rental price for the apartment. I would like to propose a rental price of 750 Euro per month. Is this acceptable to you?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Yes, I can accept that. Thank you for your understanding. I will pay 750 Euro per month for the apartment. TERMINATE.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Thank you, Max. I appreciate your willingness to pay the higher rental price. I agree to the price of 750 Euro per month for the apartment. Thank you for choosing my apartment.
name: Heinrich Heine
